sanityUiuxPage.intro: The screenshots below are a selection of UI/UX samples from my freelance work (Effective Media LLC & personally)

galleryItems.name: Guttman Realty Advisors
galleryItems.testimonial: Avi was professional and delivered our website just the way we wanted it. I would highly recommend Effective Media to anyone looking to get their website designed the way they want it and on time.

galleryItems.name: The Jerky Bar
galleryItems.testimonial: Effective Media has gone way beyond our expectations to deliver in a timely fashion a really modern clean Shopify website! Working with Avi was an absolute pleasure, and his knowledge and talents were invaluable to us! Thanks for going the extra mile, we are really proud to show off our site!

galleryItems.name: Blue Ribbon
galleryItems.testimonial: The service we received was thorough and efficient!

galleryItems.name: Crossings @ Prospect
galleryItems.testimonial: Avi from Effective Media was a pleasure to work with. He redesigned my website to be well-structured and have professional appeal. I believe he will be an invaluable asset for anyone looking to build or update their site.

galleryItems.name: Barnegat 67
galleryItems.testimonial: Working with Effective Media yielded a streamlined, striking website. We are very satisfied with the product that we have received.

galleryItems.name: Brooklyn Family Pages
galleryItems.testimonial: Avi was very helpful, knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with. He was very detail oriented and was committed to developing an excellent website customized to our needs. He "held our hands" from concept to completion (and even afterwards). His many suggestions were spot-on, and have made our website even more effective than we imagined it could be. I would definitely recommend Effective Media for anyone looking for a website designed with their unique needs in mind.
